name: Xarq
overview: XARQ is 2D top-down shooter game. The player controls an armored boat and his mission is to enter corrupted Self Build Base on the planet-Waterworld Xarqon, and destroy the Central Power Reactor. Base is a giant fortress - maze, filled with various defence structures (and mines in the water) - the player must destroy them. The ship is rotated to be able to flow in the desired direction. The player can use several weapons, like Guided Missiles or Mortars.
